material.mattext: Which of the following is not a component of multimedia?
Text
Audio
Video
Data
Which protocol is commonly used for streaming multimedia content over the internet?
FTP
HTTP
SMTP
Telnet
What is the purpose of multimedia compression techniques?
To reduce latency in multimedia transmission
To increase the bandwidth required for multimedia transmission
To reduce the size of multimedia data for efficient storage and transmission
To enhance the quality of multimedia content
Which audio file format is commonly used for storing music files?
WAV
MP3
AAC
FLAC
What is the purpose of synchronization in multimedia systems?
To align audio and video playback
To improve network latency
To compress multimedia data
To encrypt multimedia content
Which of the following is a multimedia streaming protocol?
TCP
UDP
IP
DNS
Which video codec is commonly used for video conferencing applications?
MPEG-2
AVI
MOV
What is the purpose of buffering in multimedia streaming?
To reduce network congestion
To increase the playback speed of multimedia content
To store multimedia data temporarily to compensate for network delays
To compress multimedia data for efficient transmission
Which of the following is a multimedia container format?
WAV
MP3
AVI
FLAC
What is the purpose of multimedia transcoding?
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To convert multimedia data from one format to another
To encrypt multimedia content for secure transmission
To synchronize audio and video playback
Which multimedia communication protocol is commonly used for real-time applications?
HTTP
FTP
RTP
SNMP
Which of the following is a multimedia network protocol used for video conferencing?
SMTP
SIP
DNS
POP3
What is the purpose of multimedia error concealment techniques?
To hide errors in multimedia data during transmission
To enhance the visual quality of multimedia content
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To synchronize audio and video playback
Which audio compression algorithm is commonly used for streaming music?
FLAC
AAC
MP3
WAV
Which of the following is a multimedia synchronization method?
Time-division multiplexing (TDM)
Frequency-division multiplexing (FDM)
Code-division multiple access (CDMA)
Interleaving
What is the purpose of multimedia QoS (Quality of Service) mechanisms?
To enhance the security of multimedia content
To prioritize multimedia traffic and ensure optimal performance
To compress multimedia data for efficient transmission
To synchronize audio and video playback
Which multimedia communication protocol is commonly used for email?
HTTP
FTP
SMTP
SNMP
What is the purpose of multimedia streaming servers?
To store and manage multimedia content for on-demand streaming
To compress multimedia data for efficient transmission
To synchronize audio and video playback
To enhance the quality of multimedia content
Which video file format is commonly used for online video sharing platforms?
MPEG
AVI
MP4
WMV
What is the purpose of multimedia packetization?
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To divide multimedia data into packets for transmission over a network
To synchronize audio and video playback
To encrypt multimedia content for secure transmission
Which multimedia communication protocol is commonly used for web browsing?
HTTP
FTP
SMTP
Telnet
What is the purpose of multimedia error resilience techniques?
To hide errors in multimedia data during transmission
To enhance the visual quality of multimedia content
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To synchronize audio and video playback
Which audio compression algorithm is commonly used for voice communication over IP networks?
FLAC
AAC
MP3
What is the purpose of multimedia streaming clients?
To store and manage multimedia content for on-demand streaming
To decompress multimedia data for playback
To synchronize audio and video playback
To enhance the quality of multimedia content
Which multimedia communication protocol is commonly used for file transfer?
HTTP
FTP
SMTP
SNMP
What is the purpose of multimedia content adaptation?
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To customize multimedia content based on the characteristics of the target device or network
To synchronize audio and video playback
To encrypt multimedia content for secure transmission
Which video compression standard is commonly used for high-definition video?
MPEG-2
AVI
MOV
What is the purpose of multimedia traffic shaping?
To compress multimedia data for efficient transmission
To prioritize multimedia traffic and ensure optimal performance
To synchronize audio and video playback
To enhance the security of multimedia content
Which multimedia communication protocol is commonly used for remote access to servers?
HTTP
FTP
SMTP
Telnet
What is the purpose of multimedia streaming protocols?
To compress multimedia data for efficient storage
To enable real-time delivery of multimedia content over a network
To synchronize audio and video playback
To encrypt multimedia content for secure transmission
